size.description: Size variant of the money input
size.name: size

id.description: Used as HTML id property. An id is auto-generated when it is not specified.
id.name: id

name.description: The prefix used to create a HTML `name` property for the amount input field (`${name}.amount`) and the currency dropdown (`${name}.currencyCode`).
name.name: name

value.description: Value of the input. Consists of the currency code and an amount. `amount` is a string representing the amount. A dot has to be used as the decimal separator.
value.name: value

currencies.description: List of possible currencies. When not provided or empty, the component renders a label with the value's currency instead of a dropdown.
currencies.name: currencies

onChange.description:
Called with the event of the input or dropdown when either the currency or the amount have changed.
@deprecated Use onValueChange, onAmountChange, or onCurrencyChange for better type safety and developer experience.
onChange.name: onChange

onValueChange.description:
Modern API: Called when the complete value (amount + currency) changes.
This is the recommended handler for most use cases.
onValueChange.name: onValueChange

onAmountChange.description:
Modern API: Called when only the amount changes.
Use this for granular control over amount changes.
onAmountChange.name: onAmountChange

onCurrencyChange.description:
Modern API: Called when only the currency changes.
Use this for granular control over currency changes.
onCurrencyChange.name: onCurrencyChange

isDisabled.description: Indicates that the input cannot be modified (e.g not authorized, or changes currently saving).
isDisabled.name: isDisabled

isReadOnly.description: Indicates that the field is displaying read-only content
isReadOnly.name: isReadOnly

isRequired.description: Indicates that the field is required
isRequired.name: isRequired

hasHighPrecisionBadge.description: Shows high precision badge in case current value uses high precision.
hasHighPrecisionBadge.name: hasHighPrecisionBadge

isCurrencyInputDisabled.description: Indicates that the currency input cannot be modified.
isCurrencyInputDisabled.name: isCurrencyInputDisabled

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the amount input
placeholder.name: placeholder
